#summary Load order of packages in Seaside 2.9
#labels Phase-Implementation

Details: http://www.lukas-renggli.ch/dropbox/seaside-2.9/seaside.svg

= Basic =
 * Seaside-Platform
 * Seaside-Squeak-Platform
 * Seaside-Core
 * Seaside-Squeak-Core
 * Seaside-Canvas
 * Seaside-Session
 * Seaside-Component
 * Seaside-!RenderLoop
 * Seaside-Environment

= Traditional =
 * Seaside-Flow
 * Seaside-Squeak-Continuation
 * Seaside-Squeak-Flow
 * Seaside-!WebTools
 * Seaside-Squeak-!WebTools
 * Seaside-Development
 * Seaside-Squeak-Development
 * Seaside-Examples

= Admin Tools =
 * Seaside-!OmniBrowserTools

= Tests = 
_(Should also be loadable directly after the packages they test)_

 * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Platform
 * Seaside-Tests-Core

 * Seaside-Tests-!RenderLoop
 * Seaside-Tests-Environment
 * Seaside-Tests-WebTools
 * Seaside-Tests-Development
 * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Development
 * Seaside-Tests-Functional
 * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Functional
 * Seaside-Tests-Flow
